Name: Protector of the Realm
Details: The official title of the head of state and government of the Taurian Concordat, the Protector of the Realm is also the commander in chief of the Taurian Defense Force. Since the Concordat is a constitutional monarchy, all decisions and laws are the sole responsability of the Protector, with the advice of their Privy Council and their individual power is only checked by Concordat Courts.
